name: Bento Set
description: A beautifully crafted wooden bento box with compartments for serving a variety of traditional Japanese dishes. Ideal for picnics, lunchboxes, or elegant meal presentations at home.

name: Tea Set
description: A traditional Japanese ceramic tea set featuring elegant designs, perfect for serving matcha or other teas during a cozy tea ceremony or casual gatherings.

name: Kimono
description: A stunning traditional Japanese kimono made with high-quality fabric, featuring intricate patterns and vibrant colors for any special occasion.

name: Japanese Lantern
description: A delicate paper lantern inspired by Japanese festivals. This lantern adds a touch of traditional ambiance to any room or garden decor.

name: Folding Fan
description: A traditional Japanese folding fan with beautiful artistic prints, perfect as a gift or for keeping cool in style.

name: Calligraphy Set
description: An exquisite Japanese calligraphy set complete with brushes, ink, and paper, perfect for beginners and enthusiasts to practice traditional writing art.

name: Premium Pen
description: A sleek, high-quality ballpoint pen made from premium oak wood for a luxurious writing experience.

name: Luxury Blue Pen
description: A luxurious ballpoint pen in blue, crafted from high-quality materials for smooth writing.

name: Black Pen
description: A smooth-writing ballpoint pen in sleek black, made with fine craftsmanship for professionals.

name: Classic Notebook
description: A vintage-style notebook perfect for journaling, sketching, or taking notes in style.

name: Linen Notebook
description: An elegant linen-bound notebook with a soft cover, perfect for note-taking and sketching.

name: Spiral Notebook
description: A practical spiral-bound notebook, perfect for students and professionals alike.

name: Permanent Marker
description: A durable, multi-purpose permanent marker that writes smoothly on most surfaces.

name: Chisel Tip Marker
description: A versatile chisel-tip marker designed for bold, expressive strokes on a variety of surfaces.

name: Fine Tip Marker
description: A fine-tip marker for precise, detailed writing and artwork on most surfaces.

name: White Eraser
description: A soft and effective eraser that removes pencil marks cleanly without damaging paper.

name: Pink Eraser
description: A smooth and gentle eraser that provides precise erasing without leaving marks or tearing paper.

name: Miri Eraser
description: A high-quality, dust-free eraser that erases cleanly without leaving residue or smudges.

name: Neon Highlighter
description: Bright and vibrant neon highlighters to make your notes stand out.

name: Pastel Highlighter
description: Subtle pastel shades for a softer, more refined highlight on your notes.

name: Fluorescent Highlighter
description: Intense fluorescent colors that will make any text pop for easy visibility.

name: Colorful Sticky Notes
description: A set of colorful sticky notes perfect for organizing your tasks and reminders.

name: Pastel Sticky Notes
description: A set of pastel-colored sticky notes, perfect for a soft and elegant organization.

name: Square Sticky Notes
description: A set of square sticky notes, perfect for writing larger notes and reminders.

name: Transparent Tape
description: Durable and clear tape, ideal for wrapping, crafting, and general use.

name: Clear Packing Tape
description: Strong and adhesive packing tape for secure packaging and sealing.

name: Office Transparent Tape
description: Versatile office tape for general use, ideal for documents and office projects.

name: Metal Ruler
description: Premium stainless steel ruler for precise measurements and durability.

name: Japanese Samurai Action Figure
description: Intricately designed action figure capturing the elegance of samurai culture.

name: Genki I: An Integrated Course in Elementary Japanese
description: A comprehensive textbook for beginners, this book covers essential grammar, vocabulary, and kanji for elementary-level learners of Japanese.

name: Minna no Nihongo I
description: An easy-to-follow textbook designed for beginners, featuring a mix of grammar and conversation practice with extensive exercises.

name: Japanese for Busy People I
description: A practical guide designed for busy learners, this book teaches essential Japanese grammar and phrases with easy-to-understand lessons.

name: Remembering the Kanji I
description: A helpful guide for memorizing kanji characters, focusing on visual mnemonics to enhance memory and recall of kanji.

name: Japanese from Zero! 1
description: A fun and engaging textbook for beginners with a clear approach to teaching grammar, kana, and kanji through interactive exercises.

name: A Dictionary of Basic Japanese Grammar
description: This comprehensive reference book provides detailed explanations of essential Japanese grammar points with example sentences.
